content:
Sure, here's an excel sheet where columns represent phase and months, and rows represent each phase's points and budget:

|  | Phase 1 (Month 1) | Phase 2 (Month 2-3) | Phase 3 (Month 4-6) | Phase 4 (Month 7-8) | Phase 5 (Month 9-12) |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | Define marketing objectives and target audience | $10,000 | $0 | $0 | $0 |
| 2 | Conduct market research to identify competitive landscape and audience preferences | $10,000 | $0 | $0 | $0 |
| 3 | Develop key messaging and creative concepts | $20,000 | $0 | $0 | $0 |
| 4 | Establish marketing budget and allocate resources | $10,000 | $0 | $0 | $0 |
| 5 | Develop content for marketing channels | $0 | $10,000 | $20,000 | $0 |
| 6 | Create marketing materials | $0 | $20,000 | $20,000 | $0 |
| 7 | Select marketing channels based on audience research and budget | $0 | $10,000 | $10,000 | $0 |
| 8 | Set up tracking mechanisms to measure the effectiveness of each channel | $0 | $10,000 | $5,000 | $0 |
| 9 | Launch the marketing campaign across selected channels | $0 | $0 | $20,000 | $30,000 |
| 10 | Monitor and optimize the campaign based on initial results | $0 | $0 | $20,000 | $10,000 |
| 11 | Leverage industry partnerships to promote the institute and increase awareness among potential students | $0 | $0 | $5,000 | $5,000 |
| 12 | Attend relevant industry events and participate in speaking opportunities | $0 | $0 | $5,000 | $5,000 |
| 13 | Follow up with leads generated from the marketing campaign | $0 | $0 | $5,000 | $10,000 |
| 14 | Provide personalized support to potential students throughout the enrollment process | $0 | $0 | $5,000 | $5,000 |
| 15 | Host campus visits and informational sessions for interested students and parents | $0 | $0 | $10,000 | $10,000 |
| 16 | Implement conversion optimization tactics, such as retargeting ads and email drip campaigns | $0 | $0 |  |  |
